titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Allegheny County, Pa. Jail Records (Court Dockets), 1863-1932 AIS.1975.08
titlestmt.author: Archives Service Center staff.

note.p: Finding aid entered into AT by Ed Galloway, Dec. 2010.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2024-07-08 17:14:39 -0400.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

did.unittitle: Allegheny County, Pa. Jail Records (Court Dockets)

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: Allegheny County Courthouse and Jail (Pittsburgh, Pa.)

did.abstract: Collection contains ledgers documenting jail records and court dockets for individuals incarcerated in the Allegheny County Jail between 1863-1932.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: Daily Register (Daily Record) of prisoners received, 1893-1925; Vagrants Received and Discharged, 1886-1925; Court Dockets, 1864-1926; Index to Court Dockets, 1901-1925; Summary Docket (Summary Convictions; Summary Register), 1863-1929; Summary of Convictions, 1907-1926; Courts: Received and Discharged, 1886- 1922; Daily Disposition Record, 1906-1925; Alphabetical List of Prisoners' and Attorneys' Names, 1914-1921; Docket of United States Prisoners, 1899-1926; Convict Description Docket, 1920-1932; Discharge Description Docket, 1873-1928; Quarterly Report of All Persons Committed to Allegheny County Prison, 1909-1912; Ledger, 1900-1921; Journal (Day Book), 1902-1924; Cash book, 1923-1927.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Deposited by the Allegheny County Jail, August 12, 1975.

bioghist.head: History
bioghist.p: In 1817 the county commissioners were authorized by the state to erect a jail in Pittsburgh at the corner of 4th Avenue and Jail Alley. In 1836 a new Allegheny County Jail and Courthouse was erected on Grant Street. When the courthouse was destroyed by fire in 1882, the jail was razed and the present structure was built on Ross Street in 1886. The Allegheny County Jail has always been under the control of the county commissioners.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Allegheny County, Pa. Jail Records (Court Dockets), 1863-1932, AIS.1975.08, Archives & Special Collections, University of Pittsburgh Library System

odd.head: Previous Citation
odd.p: Allegheny County, Pa. Jail Records (Court Dockets), 1863-1932, AIS.1975.08, Archives Service Center, University of Pittsburgh

controlaccess.subject: Government
Court records -- Pennsylvania -- Allegheny County
Jails -- Pennsylvania -- Allegheny County
controlaccess.corpname: Allegheny County Courthouse and Jail (Pittsburgh, Pa.) -- Records and correspondence

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: Daily register of prisoners received. Contains: name; residence; age; sex; color; nationality; occupation; marital status; literacy; to be held for court or as a vagrant; charge.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: Contains: date received; name and date scheduled for release; name and date of release.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: Contains: alphabetized index to prisoners; names; magistrate; prosecutor; date of commitment; offence; how discharged.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: Contains: prisoner name; magistrate; prosecutor; offence; days; remarks.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: Contains: alphabetized listing of prisoner names; code numbers; dates.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: Contains: dates and names of prisoners received; dates and names of prisoners discharged.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: Contains: names of prisoners discharged each day; code number; name; condition of release.

did.unittitle: Alphabetized List of Prisoners' and Attorneys' Names

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: Contains: date of commitment; race; name; offence; by whom committed; term of sentence; period charged, from, to; date of discharge; by whom discharged; remarks; quarterly recapitulation. 4,799 prisoners listed.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: Contains: register number; name; when received; age when received; color; sex; nativity; color of hair and eyes; marks and scars; height; weight; parental relations; length of school attendance; Sunday school attendance; literacy; industrial training; occupation; drinking habits; marital status; military service; date of sentence; term of sentence; number of convictions; time served; remarks. 5,344 prisoners listed.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: Contains: register number; name; age when discharged; color; sex; crime; date of sentence; when discharged; how discharged; whether or not detained for costs for misconduct; time served; weight; amount earned in overwork during imprisonment; intended residence; remarks.

did.unittitle: Quarterly Report of All Persons Committed to Allegheny County Prison

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: Contains: register number; name; and how prisoner was disposed of.
